languages.text: {n}В голосе Каллигоса звучит подначка.{/n} "Слышал, ты, {name}, неплох{mf||а} в драке. Как думаешь, смог{mf||ла} бы ты выпотрошить Вортена? Или это он бы тебя выпотрошил?"

traits.locale_text: {n}В голосе Каллигоса звучит подначка.{/n} "Слышал, ты, {name}, неплох{mf||а} в драке. Как думаешь, смог{mf||ла} бы ты выпотрошить Вортена? Или это он бы тебя выпотрошил?"

languages.text: {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе Каллигоса звучит подначка.{/n} "Слышал, ты, {name}, неплох{mf||а} в драке. Как думаешь, смог{mf||ла} бы ты выпотрошить Вортена? Или это он бы тебя выпотрошил?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos says, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールはあからさまな非難の言葉を吐く。{/n}「お前のことは聞いたぞ、{name}、そこそこ戦えるってな。どうだ？お前、ヴォルテンのはらわたを取れると思うか？それとも、お前が取られる側になりそうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィンタースケールはあからさまな非難の言葉を吐く。{/n}「お前のことは聞いたぞ、{name}、そこそこ戦えるってな。どうだ？お前、ヴォルテンのはらわたを取れると思うか？それとも、お前が取られる側になりそうか？」

languages.text: {n}温特斯凯尔开了口，语气中带着明显的嘲讽之意。{/n}“{name}，我听说你也是把干架的好手。你说，要是你和沃尔腾打一架，你能打败他吗？还是说，他能把你干趴下？”
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}温特斯凯尔开了口，语气中带着明显的嘲讽之意。{/n}“{name}，我听说你也是把干架的好手。你说，要是你和沃尔腾打一架，你能打败他吗？还是说，他能把你干趴下？”

languages.text: {n}Winterscale comenta, a modo de burla obvia:{/n} «{name}, he oído que es decente en combate. ¿Qué opina? Si fuera necesario, ¿podría destripar a Worten en una pelea o sería usted {mf|el|la} destripad{mf|o|a}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale comenta, a modo de burla obvia:{/n} «{name}, he oído que es decente en combate. ¿Qué opina? Si fuera necesario, ¿podría destripar a Worten en una pelea o sería usted {mf|el|la} destripad{mf|o|a}?».

languages.text: {n}Winterscale continue sur un ton mi-badineur, mi-provocateur :{/n} « J'ai entendu dire que vous aviez un certain talent pour le combat, {name}. Alors, qu'en pensez-vous ? S'il le fallait, seriez-vous capable d'étriper Worten ? Ou Worten vous étriperait-il ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale continue sur un ton mi-badineur, mi-provocateur :{/n} « J'ai entendu dire que vous aviez un certain talent pour le combat, {name}. Alors, qu'en pensez-vous ? S'il le fallait, seriez-vous capable d'étriper Worten ? Ou Worten vous étriperait-il ? »

languages.text: {n}Winterzunder merkt bewusst spitzzüngig an:{/n} "Ich habe gehört, Ihr kämpft selbst recht anständig, {name}. Was meint Ihr ... könntet Ihr ihn im Ernstfall mit Worten ausweiden? Oder würde er eher Euch ausweiden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterzunder merkt bewusst spitzzüngig an:{/n} "Ich habe gehört, Ihr kämpft selbst recht anständig, {name}. Was meint Ihr ... könntet Ihr im Ernstfall mit Worten ausweiden? Oder würde er eher Euch ausweiden?"

languages.text: {n}Winterscale bariz şekilde laf sokarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Kavgada iyi olduğunu duydum {name}. Ne dersin, iş o raddeye varacak olsa Worten'i şişleyebilir misin? Yoksa o mu seni şişler?
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale remarks, taking an obvious jab,{/n} "I've heard that you, {name}, are decent in a fight. What do you think — could you gut Worten if it came down to it? Or would he be the one gutting you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale bariz şekilde laf sokarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Kavgada iyi olduğunu duydum {name}. Ne dersin, sence iş o raddeye varırsa kim kimi yer?"
